channel.description: Recent content in 记事本 on Code996

item.title: SpringBoot集成ZeroMQ
item.description: 开发ZeroMQ的SpringBoot Starter。 resources中META-INF中增加文件spring.factories： org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.EnableAutoConfiguration=net.ytoframework.plugin.zeromq.ZeroMQAutoConfiguration 配置

item.title: elasticsearch
item.description: elasticsearch安装记录： Linux： sudo wget https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-6.5.1.zip unzip elasticsearch-6.5.1.zip cd elasticsearch-6.5.1 sudo chown -R z * ./bin/elasticsearch curl localhost:9200 Windows： 下载elasticsearch， https://www.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch 解压 修改配置
